channel.title: CVE Feed for Vektor,Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Vektor,Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-27926|2024-08-02T12:23:30.598Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Profile setting function of VK All in One Expansion Unit 9.88.1.0 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-27925|2024-08-02T12:23:30.864Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20blocks%20and%20vk%20blocks%20pro
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Post function of VK Blocks 1.53.0.1 and earlier and VK Blocks Pro 1.53.0.1 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-28367|2024-08-02T12:38:25.166Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in CTA post function of VK All in One Expansion Unit 9.88.1.0 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2023-27923|2024-08-02T12:23:30.537Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20blocks%20and%20vk%20blocks%20pro
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Tag edit function of VK Blocks 1.53.0.1 and earlier and VK Blocks Pro 1.53.0.1 and earlier allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script.

item.title: CVE-2024-32826|2024-08-02T02:20:35.639Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20block%20patterns
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Vektor,Inc. VK Block Patterns.This issue affects VK Block Patterns: from n/a through 1.31.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37956|2024-07-22T13:35:16.509Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20all%20in%20one%20expansion%20unit
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vektor,Inc. VK All in One Expansion Unit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects VK All in One Expansion Unit: from n/a through 9.98.1.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-32826|2024-06-04T17:49:41.197Z -- vektor%2Cinc. -- vk%20block%20patterns
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Vektor,Inc. VK Block Patterns.This issue affects VK Block Patterns: from n/a through 1.31.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vektor,Inc. VK All in One Expansion Unit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects VK All in One Expansion Unit: from n/a through 9.98.1.0.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Vektor,Inc. VK All in One Expansion Unit allows Stored XSS.This issue affects VK All in One Expansion Unit: from n/a through 9.99.1.0.
